body_html:
Use the _LayerRNNCell; the other contrib classes will be moved over to that eventually as well.
…
On Tue, Dec 19, 2017 at 7:13 PM, Tian Jin ***@***.***> wrote: Hi @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> should I stick to _LayerRNNCell as the base class or switch back to RNNCell as the base class as for other rnn architectures in rnn_cell.py in the contrib directory (e.g., https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/ 8103945/tensorflow/contrib/ rnn/python/ops/rnn_cell.py#L92). — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
Use the _LayerRNNCell; the other contrib classes will be moved over to that
eventually as well.

On Tue, Dec 19, 2017 at 7:13 PM, Tian Jin <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Hi @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> should I stick to _LayerRNNCell
> as the base class or switch back to RNNCell as the base class as for
> other rnn architectures in rnn_cell.py in the contrib directory (e.g.,
> https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/
> 810394550571c5feb333cb6da66afb4b20c3bd85/tensorflow/contrib/
> rnn/python/ops/rnn_cell.py#L92).
>
